title: All You Need To Know About Surya Namaskar And Its Health Benefits
author: Riddhi Parmar
description: Know about the health benefits of Surya Namaskar and how it helps to strengthen our body. Learn about the 12 steps of Surya Namaskar & its amazing benefits
cleaned_text: All You Need To Know About Surya Namaskar And Its Health Benefits By Riddhi Parmar +2 more By Riddhi Parmar +2 more Yoga has been part of our ancient culture. It means "to unite with the self" or "become one." Yoga helps to unite the body, mind, and breathe synchronously. Surya Namaskar is an important aspect of the practice of yoga. Table of Contents Surya Namaskar, also called Sun Salutation is an ancient yogic practice of paying respects to the sun. Seven different postures or Asana are done cyclically into a specific 12 steps pattern in a Surya Namaskar. It is known to be an effective cardiovascular workout and has a greatly positive impact on the human body and mind. This routine is generally considered to be a morning practice which is to be performed at dawn. The sequence of asanas or poses stimulates all organs, systems, muscles, and chakras. Among other health benefits of Surya Namaskar, it is also said to cultivate stillness and concentration of the mind. Studies suggest that regular Surya namaskar helps in decreasing cortisol levels in the body, it also inhibits the limbic system which may eventually help people with depression.Dr. Nikhil Yadav, MBBS MD, CCEBDM Surya Namaskar is done in 12 steps or poses in a sequential manner as mentioned below: Pranamasana (1st & 12th pose), Hasta Uttanasana (2nd 7 11th pose), Hastapaadasana (3rd &10th (4th and 9th and 8th of [health benefits](https://pharmeasy.in/blog/can-jogging-offer-you-numerous-health-benefits/): Surya Namaskar can be done at any time of the day. However, the best time to do Surya Namaskar is at sunrise as exposure to the sun activates our solar plexus. As Surya Namaskar involves full-body movements and stretching, it helps to shed the extra fat from your body. Some clinical studies have shown that Surya Namaskar is effective in weight loss. Surya Namaskar improves the blood supply to the scalp that provides adequate nutrition to our hair. This ultimately [prevents hair loss](https://pharmeasy.in/blog/health-benefits-of-curry-leaves/). Increased blood circulation to the skin has anti-ageing effects and helps to maintain healthy and young skin. We should practice Surya Namaskar regularly to experience its amazing health benefits. It is advised to do it under the supervision of a trained [yoga](https://pharmeasy.in/blog/5-benefits-of-yoga-for-good-health/) teacher or consult your doctor if you have any medical condition. There are several benefits of Surya Namaskar that can affect an individual physically and psychologically.
